message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product, and I think it's worth a premium price. I'm willing to start with an offer of $12,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000.
I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep, but I still think the product is worth a premium price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm offering $10,500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.

I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think $10,000 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
I think we're getting close, but I'm not willing to give up much more. I'm willing to meet you at $9,750, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
